beats.visual: Duchess flicks on the bubblegum mixer; batter glows neon.
beats.gag_note: Mixer hum builds like a superhero transformation.

beats.visual: Mixer blasts pancake spiral; Duchess leaps onto the counter island.
beats.gag_note: Kitchen utensils salute as the cyclone forms.

beats.visual: Spinning pancakes orbit fridge magnets cheering in speech bubbles.
Duchess rides a spatula surfboard through the batter vortex.
Neon batter splashes window; Duchess winks at viewers mid-spin.
beats.gag_note: Fourth-wall break with batter smiley face.

beats.visual: Duchess slow-motion dodges syrup comet streaking past ears.
Cyclone gulps toaster; Duchess slaps giant off switch with tail.
Batter rains confetti; fridge prints instant replay for crowd.
Ceiling drip forms pancake halo as Duchess takes a bow.

tts_line: Duchess upgrades breakfast to pancake parkour mode.
style_prompt: cartoon elegant black cat, satin sheen, clean bold outlines, flat jewel-tone accents, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, bubblegum pancake cyclone swirling over chrome kitchen counters, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
